title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
Identify the key features and functionalities of the personalized healthcare platform using AI based on genetic data. The platform should provide personalized medical care, with emphasis on GDPR and HIPAA compliance. The following specific requirements need to be addressed:
1. User Registration and Authentication
2. Data Collection via Genetic Testing Integration
3. Secure Data Storage and Encryption
4. AI Model Development for Personalized Medical Care Recommendations, with focus on explainability and interpretability of the model's outputs and ensuring adherence to HIPAA/GDPR regulations.
5. User Interface Design for an intuitive and user-friendly experience that caters to both technical and non-technical audiences.
6. API Development for Third-Party Integration
7. Quality Assurance and Testing, including usability testing, with a focus on ensuring the platform is secure and compliant with HIPAA/GDPR regulations.
8. Documentation for Developers and Users, emphasizing clear and concise documentation that caters to both technical and non-technical audiences, and including sections on data privacy and security procedures.
9. Implementing an effective feedback system for users to provide continuous improvement suggestions.

title: Design Genetic Data Collection System
description: Create a system to collect genetic data securely and efficiently.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for Genetic Data Input
description: Create a user-friendly interface for users to input their genetic data.

title: Implement Backend Services for Genetic Data Processing
description: Build the backend services to process and analyze the collected genetic data.

title: Integrate AI Models for Personalized Healthcare Recommendations
description: Implement AI models to provide personalized healthcare recommendations based on the analyzed genetic data.
dependencies: Implement Backend Services for Genetic Data Processing

title: Create Database Schema and Setup Storage Solutions
description: Design a database schema to store the collected genetic data, user information, and AI-generated recommendations.

title: Develop Unit and Integration Tests for Each Component
description: Write unit and integration tests to ensure the functionality of each component.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for Genetic Data Input
Implement Backend Services for Genetic Data Processing
Integrate AI Models for Personalized Healthcare Recommendations
Create Database Schema and Setup Storage Solutions

title: Document System Architecture and API Documentation
description: Write clear documentation detailing the system architecture and providing API documentation.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for Genetic Data Input
Implement Backend Services for Genetic Data Processing
Integrate AI Models for Personalized Healthcare Recommendations
Create Database Schema and Setup Storage Solutions

title: Perform Security Audit of the Entire System
description: Ensure that the platform is secure and complies with necessary data privacy regulations.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for Genetic Data Input
Implement Backend Services for Genetic Data Processing
Integrate AI Models for Personalized Healthcare Recommendations
Create Database Schema and Setup Storage Solutions
